react.name: React & Frontend
react.description: React, Next.js, and modern frontend development

architecture.name: Software Architecture
architecture.description: System design, patterns, and best practices

testing.name: Testing & Quality
testing.description: Unit tests, E2E tests, testing strategies

bookmarks.title: Understanding React Server Components
bookmarks.author: React Team
bookmarks.description: A comprehensive guide to understanding React Server Components and when to use them in your Next.js applications.

bookmarks.title: Building Scalable React Applications
bookmarks.author: Kent C. Dodds
bookmarks.description: Learn how to manage application state effectively in large React applications without over-engineering.
bookmarks.notes: Great insights on when to use context vs external state

bookmarks.title: System Design Interview Guide
bookmarks.author: Donne Martin
bookmarks.description: Learn how to design large-scale systems. Prep for the system design interview.
bookmarks.notes: Must read before system design interviews

bookmarks.title: Web Performance Optimization Techniques
bookmarks.author: Google Developers
bookmarks.description: Comprehensive guide to measuring and improving web performance metrics like Core Web Vitals.

bookmarks.title: The Staff Engineer's Path
bookmarks.author: Will Larson
bookmarks.description: Understanding different archetypes of staff engineers and how to grow into senior technical roles.

bookmarks.title: Building RESTful APIs with Node.js
bookmarks.author: Node.js Team
bookmarks.description: Deep dive into HTTP transactions in Node.js and best practices for building robust APIs.

bookmarks.title: Docker Best Practices for Production
bookmarks.author: Docker Team
bookmarks.description: Essential best practices for using Docker in production environments, including security and optimization.
bookmarks.notes: Need to implement these in current project

bookmarks.title: Testing JavaScript Applications
bookmarks.author: Kent C. Dodds
bookmarks.description: Comprehensive course on testing JavaScript applications with Jest, React Testing Library, and Cypress.
bookmarks.notes: Great resource for improving test coverage

bookmarks.title: Web Security Fundamentals
bookmarks.author: OWASP
bookmarks.description: The OWASP Top 10 is a standard awareness document for developers and web application security.

bookmarks.title: Data Structures and Algorithms in JavaScript
bookmarks.author: Oleksii Trekhleb
bookmarks.description: Algorithms and data structures implemented in JavaScript with explanations and links to further readings.

bookmarks.title: Advanced TypeScript Patterns
bookmarks.author: TypeScript Team
bookmarks.description: Learn advanced TypeScript patterns including conditional types, mapped types, and template literal types.

bookmarks.title: Microservices Architecture Patterns
bookmarks.author: Chris Richardson
bookmarks.description: Comprehensive guide to microservices patterns, including decomposition strategies and data management.

bookmarks.title: Why Next.js Falls Short on Software Engineering
bookmarks.author: Harshal Patil
bookmarks.description: Exploring the limitations of Next.js as a full-stack framework for software engineering.
